Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are an all-solid energy conversion device from the chemical energy of fuels to electric energy at intermediate and high temperatures.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Up to now, massive efforts have been made in developing different components of solid oxide fuel cells, including electrolyte, anode, cathode and interconnect materials.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Rare earth elements play an indispensable role in different components of SOFCs which have been extensively studied in the recent decades.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this review, we concentrate upon the rare earth application and recent advances in SOFCs and related materials.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Materials structure involves pe-rovskites, Ruddlesden-Popper, fluorite, spinel, pyrochlore, apatite and so on.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the effects of rare earth based oxides as matrix or dopants in different components are also discussed.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Structures and properties of the materials are related to the element type, valence, coordination and ion radius.
Titulo: Applications and recent advances of rare earth in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This article will provide a comprehensive research direction towards SOFCs components for their composi-tion, structural design and mechanisms research.(c) 2021 Chinese Society of Rare Earths.
